choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and chia seeds (add water to the oats instead of milk)
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing made without honey or garlic. Add some quinoa for extra protein. 
Dinner: Baked salmon with steamed broccoli (no butter) and roasted sweet potato wedges (add olive oil instead of almonds, pistachios, or cashews). For dessert, have a bowl of mixed fruit.
